title: The OS X Mountain Lion Pocket Guide 2012
description:
Book Description

This low-priced, handy guide is packed with practical guidance for people who want to jump in and start using the OS X Mountain Lion. Written by Jeff Carlson, this essential companion features snappy writing, eye-catching graphics, and a clean design to help readers get the most out of OS X Mountain Lion. Jeff guides readers through AppleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s OS X Mountain Lion, showing you how to:

Download, set up, and starting using Mountain Lion.

Manage files with iCloud.

Swipe, pinch, and scroll: Master Mountain LionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Mult-Touch gestures.

Install applications from the Mac App Store, and stay safe with Gatekeeper.

Stay in touch: Enjoy video calls with family and friends with FaceTime and chat them up with Messages.

DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t miss another email, calendar alert, or friend request with Notification Center.

Show off your gaming skills through Game Center.

In addition, Jeff offers plenty of tips and tricks for getting the most from Mountain Lion.
